channel.title: Bash on Ravi Raja Merugu
channel.description: Recent content in Bash on Ravi Raja Merugu

item.title: Compute Client
item.description: This is the local installable web client to view and analyse the data created by R2 Client.

item.title: r2 console
item.description: Command line utility for tracking/monitoring the command-line activity of a researcher. The monitored data can be used to replicate the project or automate it. This is a sub project of the research assistant project.
